author: vmassol
msg: Corrected bug in AbstractHttpServletRequestWrapper.getPathTranslated(), which was not returning null when getRealPath("/") was returning null. It is allowed by the spec. to return null upon certain conditions (see section SRV.4.5 of the Servlet 2.3 spec.).
